title: Complete Full-Stack Development Course
description: A comprehensive course covering modern web development from frontend to backend. Learn React for building interactive user interfaces with components, props, state management, and hooks. Master advanced React concepts including context API, performance optimization, suspense, and server-side rendering. Build robust backend APIs using Node.js and Express framework with middleware, routing, and authentication. Work with NoSQL databases using MongoDB for data storage, querying, and integration with Node.js applications. Complete hands-on projects building full-stack MERN applications with user authentication, real-time features, and deployment strategies. Gain practical experience with modern development tools, version control, testing, and best practices for scalable web applications.
prerequisites: Basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript knowledge
learning_outcomes: Build interactive React applications with modern hooks and state management
Develop RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
Create full-stack MERN applications with authentication
Deploy web applications to production environments
Apply best practices for code organization and testing
